original_text: If you do something that is wrong, it does not hurt God. Even if you do many wrong things, it does nothing to him. If you do something that is wrong,
korean_text: 그대가 범죄한들 하나님께 무슨 영향이 있겠으며 그대의 악행이 가득한들 하나님께 무슨 상관이 있겠으며

sentences.original_text: If you do something that is wrong
Even if you do many wrong things

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그에게 아무런 영향을 주지 않는다

sentences.original_text: If you do something that is wrong
